title: DC Players please do not play ranked
body:
It's actually "really" not fair how opponent team gets a free "win".
This is ranked. Not Normal game.
If even one player gets DC, we automatically loses a game. Maybe we can win. But thats maybe, and this is ranked..
what kind of team loses 4 v 5 right?
I mean because of that one DC players, all "4" of us have to ruin our LP. Thats just not fair at all.
even tho we report this player obviously that person is not gonna get reported otherwise he does it in the future multiple times.
I just dont understand why I have to lose cuz of one person getting DC.
obviously everyone gonna say "life is not fair" "People do DC get over with it" "your unlucky" things like that to me but
c'mon thats not the answer to this subject...This is ranked please understand that..
Riot should really just end the game right away when player dont get back in 5 min "during game" not just in the beginning. 
This is really not fair. NO EXCUSE what so ever. Not a fair game/match.

replies.body:
So heres the problem
the winning team is now shafted for winning????
Losing team loses nothing

Scenario that will happen

Your team is losing bad, its past the 30 min mark
your teams duo says, "nw guys I got dis"
and one leaves the game
Now the winning team who obviously is winning
has both wasted their time and effort towards winning because someone on the enemy team"dcd"

You can not have a winner without a loser
so now 10 people wasted 1/2 an hr to an hr for nothing

I have won 4v5's before. I would rather have a shot at winning one than Riot going "o
Ok, you don't get to play League today. Leave your lp on the way out".
